Name: Daiquiri Elixir
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Freshly pressed sugar cane syrup and the French elixir, Chartreuse, add complexity to the classic Daiquiri .
History: A Daiquiri variation created by yours truly. Daiquiri cocktail history
Nutrition: One serving of Daiquiri Elixir contains 139 calories
